snippet.title: [PC/JPN] Wander Wonder - action RPG from Compile
snippet.description:
Original Japanese games on PC are an abnormal occurrence. Even more so when they don`t come from Nihon Falcom(the makers of Ys, Xanadu, Brandish and The Legend of Heroes). Wander Wonder is a virtually unknown action/RPG by the now defunct Japanese developer Compile(not to be confused with Compile Heart). Gameplay-wise it`s an enjoyable mix of hack`n`slash action and puzzle solving: think Alundra or Ys. It`s a real mystery why this was never ported to any other system or why it came out on PC in the first place.

Japanese fonts need to be installed for this game to work correctly in Windows XP(not sure if it runs in Windows 7). If you have them installed, just use Microsoft`s AppLocale to launch the game - it`s more convenient than having to reboot your PC in Japanese mode every time you want to play it.
